name: UNITED STATES PARK POLICE FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE LABOR COMMITTEE
sampleDescriptions: Operational status of federal national parks under the jurisdiction of the United States Park Police in light of the COVID-19 pandemic.
National park operations in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic.
National park operations in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic.
Policing reform proposals, including the union's support for body worn cameras and additional training for US Park Police officers.
Regulatory and statutory impediments to recruit and retain officers.  Need for new/updated equipment.  Police reform proposals, including need for body worn camera program.
